entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • windows/x86: Assertion failed 'unreached' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #107587
  • JavaScript interop source generator should emit #line directives pointing to the originating declaration #107577
  • Unify All `AVX512*` Flags and All `AVX512VBMI*` Flags in Crossgen2 and ILC #107573
    10.0.0
  • [9.0][osx] Assert test failure: Values differ in TestProviderTimer #107571
    10.0.0
  • [9.0][osx][ios] Failure: llvm::SmallVectorBase<unsigned long long>::set_size(unsigned long) #107569
    9.0.0
  • Multicore JIT MAX_METHODS = 0x4000 limitation #107567
    Future
  • TensorSpan System.Array constructor #107566
    10.0.0
  • Considerable performance gap between `Enumerable.ToList<T>()` and `List(IEnumerable<T>)` constructor #107560
  • [mono] Windows x64 Mono job BinaryFormatterTests exception #107553
  • [API Proposal]: Add more parameters on the CreateClient from the IHttpClientFactory #107552
  • [android][infra] Runtime tests on Android are not getting sent to Helix #107551
  • [wasm] Marshaling bool within struct with [MarshalAs(UnmanagedType.U1)] throws System.InvalidProgramException #107546
  • Fuzzlyn: Assertion failed '!fgIsCommaThrow(morphedTree)' during 'Morph - Global' #107544
    9.0.0
  • Fuzzlyn: Assertion failed '(unop->Type == TYP_LONG) && (op1->Type == TYP_INT)' during 'Optimize Induction Variables' #107543
    9.0.0
  • Fuzzlyn: Assertion failed '((tree->gtDebugFlags & GTF_DEBUG_NODE_MORPHED) == 0) && "ERROR: Already morphed this node!"' #107542
    9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Static constructor interpreter does not support spans #107541
    Future
  • FusedMultiplyAdd (FMA) default to vfmadd213, even in situation where 231 (I think) should be preferred #107538
    10.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: ExtendWidening ConditionalSelect tests failing #107537
    9.0.0
  • BinaryFormatter tests are no longer skipped when ran against source-built runtime #107534
  • [WASI] Wasi.Build.Tests.HttpTests.HttpBuildThenRunThenPublish #107530
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: GC/Scenarios/muldimjagary/muldimjagary/muldimjagary.cmd #107528
  • `ConcurrentDictionary.TryRemove` sometimes does not remove an existing key #107525
  • Assertion failed 'block->hasHndIndex() == true' #107524
    9.0.0
  • Application that targets .NET 4.8 does not support System.Data.SqlClient that targets .NET Standard 2.0 #107523
  • superpmi collection: linux arm64/arm32 fail to create CORE_ROOT #107522
    9.0.0
  • superpmi collection "mcs -strip" data corruption #107521
    10.0.0
  • superpmi collection: benchmark collection FSharp.dll fails #107520
    10.0.0
  • Test failure in Runtime_107146 with `DOTNET_EnablePOPCNT=0` #107519
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'markedLastLoop && markedCurrLoop' #107518
    9.0.0

Closed

  • JIT: [arm32] Assertion failed 'baseRegUsed == reg2' during 'Generate code' #105620
    9.0.0
  • Host should inform user about different archs when failing to find framework #51102
    Future
  • JIT SVE: Assertion failed 'nestedOp2->OperIsHWIntrinsic()' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #106869
    9.0.0
  • JIT: [arm32] Assertion failed 'varDsc->IsAlwaysAliveInMemory() || ((regSet.GetMaskVars() & regMask) == 0)' during 'Generate code' #105619
    10.0.0
  • Unit tests that pass on Windows, fail on Linux (Ubuntu). #90579
    Future
  • JIT: Debug/Release diff on ARM32 #106551
    9.0.0
  • TaskScheduler should be able to cancel pending tasks #24221
  • Add official type for "Void for Generic arguments" cases (and kill brand new non-generic "ValueTask") #25435
  • BufferBlock with non-zero count and no consumers never completes if Canceled after Complete() #27357
  • API Proposal: TaskScheduler.Queue(Action, object) #30471
  • AsyncLocal<T> to let programmer clone the value in the old thread context #31783
  • After upgrading to .NET 9, simple C# statement triggers fatal error in Visual Studio 2022 when Control-C is used to exit #107263
    10.0.0
  • Assertion failed `(pThread->m_StateNC & Thread::TSNC_OwnsSpinLock) == 0` #104449
    9.0.0
  • JsonSchemaExporter.GetJsonSchemaAsNode "format" output cannot be controlled by configuration #107501
    Future
  • Test failure: managed/Compilation/Compilation/Compilation.cmd #107527
  • JsonSerializerOptions.TypeInfoResolver does not apply all the JsonSourceGenerationOptions #107535
  • JSON-(de)serialize Base64 string as ImmutableArray<byte> #107352
  • [8.0] Build failure in Workloads-NoWebcil-Wasm.Build.NativeRebuild.Tests.OptimizationFlagChangeTests #106663
    10.0.0
  • Is System.Text.Json 8.0.4 version is backward compatible with 8.0.3 version #107451
  • [mono] Mobile failures in TensorExtensionsTwoSpanInSpanOut #107244
  • System.Text.Json Trim Warning - 'System.Exception.TargetSite.get' which has 'RequiresUnreferencedCodeAttribute' #107375
  • [API Proposal]: MaxOrDefault, MinOrDefault #107370
  • [browser][MT] Jiterpreter does not know which features are enabled on worker threads #107443
    10.0.0
  • Transient high severity vulnerability (System.Text.Json) in Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Json #107342
  • JSON deserialization errors with response.Content.ReadFromJsonAsync<List<T>> where JsonSerializer.Deserialize works fine #107279
  • System.Text.Json serialization bug on virtual/override properties. #107273
  • [API Proposal]: Dictionary<T,V> when TryGetValue false support set the default value or Fun/Action to return? #107243
  • System.Text.Json should not be installed successfully on netcoreapp3.1 #107271
  • [TieredCompilation] Performance regression due to extra indirections (non-virtual case) #965
  • Use new fanotify Linux API in FileSystemWatcher #30495
  • [API] FileSystemEventArgs extended with NotifyFilters information #30745
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_107146/Runtime_107146/Runtime_107146.dll #107526
  • Dynamically adding nested properties when using an ExpandoObject instance #90064
    9.0.0
  • Add json support to --info output #3049
  • Minimize stack memory for every CoreCLR app #3189
  • Support per-file conflict resolution for native files and resource assemblies #3269
  • Research case-insensitive API usage #3273
  • machine wide installation of user created .net core package #3288
  • Cache file scan results between corehost_main_with_output_buffer and hostpolicy!corehost_main #3306
  • macOS: Unable to read Apple keychain secrets from published osx.10.12-x64 binary after upgrading from netcoreapp2.0 to netcoreapp2.1 (native code gen problem?) #3316
  • HTTP2: Rework existing remote server tests to run against remote HTTP2 endpoint also #1583
  • Programmatically resolving shared frameworks #3412
  • Add a test leg which runs on legacy Windows (not Win10) #3423
  • deps.json parsing doesn't fail on missing library #3524
  • Consider adding host tests which run as admin/root in a container #3576
  • Add tests for backward compatibility of hostfxr #3583
  • Allow synchronization of tracing across hosting layer #3627
  • HTTP2: inconsistent exception location during frame receive #1501
  • Deprecate --fx-version command line option to dotnet.exe #3653
  • Allow callers of hostfxr_* to receive warnings and possibly information messages #3663
  • HTTP2 code coverage: add tests for connection idle timeout and lifetime #1498
  • Use symbolic link to speed up looking up latest version of hostfxr #3670
  • Potential for conflict between runtime args and app args #3686
  • Allow initialization of secondary components in self contained context #3716
  • Could DOTNET_ROOT accept a `:` delimited path to various .NET components #3749
  • HTTP2: Support sending dynamic headers #1588

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasm] More Task changes #107586
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • JIT: Simplify block insertion when cloning finally regions #107585
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Arm: Fix the base register used for restoring register from stack #107584
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove ILCompiler package reference #107583
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix placement of loop exit blocks in handler regions #107582
    NO-MERGE, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] ARM64-SVE: Allow op inside conditionalselect to be non HWintrinsic #107581
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add missing `[RequiresDynamicCode]` attributes to System.Linq.Expressions API in ref assembly #107580
    area-System.Linq.Expressions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix config source gen binding with SslClientAuthenticationOptions #107579
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 10.0.0
  • [manual] Merge release/8.0-staging into release/8.0 #107578
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 8.0.10
  • [DiagnosticSource] Add version event to EventSources used for out-of-proc monitoring #107576
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • Allow preinitializing spans created from arrays #107575
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove FCThrowRes from AssemblyNative::IsDynamic #107574
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [manual] Merge release/6.0-staging into release/6.0 #107572
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 6.0.35
  • Make DAC and ProfToEEInterfaceImpl stop using BaseDomain #107570
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix `emitter::emitSplit` to not create zero-sized method fragment #107568
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • All mobile platforms go down the RunTests.sh path, not just browser. #107563
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Clean up some FIXMEs in the jiterpreter #107562
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • JIT: random partial compilation stress mode #107561
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [s390x] Use consistent shift instruction #107559
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • [mono] Revert "don't define HAS_CUSTOM_BLOCKS on mono (#106764)" #107558
    area-System.Memory, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Increase jiterpreter limits #107557
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [release/9.0] Fix thread static cleanup paths #107554
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix heap corruption issue in PriorityQueue.Remove #107550
    area-System.Collections, 10.0.0
  • Disable binary formatter tests when DotNetBuildSourceOnly. #107549
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] [ILStrip] Fix passing assemblies using relative path #107548
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios
  • Unify linking file composition for wasi and wasm. #107547
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Fix JsonSchemaExporter support for global UnmappedMemberHandling settings. #107545
    area-System.Text.Json, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] BinaryFormatter tests improvements #107540
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, test-enhancement, 9.0.0
  • Fix ISA check in Runtime_107146 test #107539
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] TypeName fuzzer and bug fixes #107533
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • [NRBF] throw SerializationException when a surrogate character is read #107532
    area-System.Formats.Nrbf
  • Consolidate log for reliability framework #107517
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Use SearchValues in Uri.CheckForUnicodeOrEscapedUnreserved #107357
    area-System.Net
  • Extend the list of recognized `SearchValues<char>` field names in Regex #107402
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 10.0.0
  • Arm: Fix the base register used for restoring register from stack #107564
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make missing framework error message list other architectures that were found #107156
    area-Host
  • [release/9.0] Fix corner-case accounting bug in new codeheap allocation #107514
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Implement getClassAssemblyName #107516
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ARM64-SVE: Allow op inside conditionalselect to be non HWintrinsic #107180
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Arm: Consider the fact that targetReg can be second half during resolution #107493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix infinite loop in genCreateAddrMode #106767
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.10
  • [release/9.0] Fixing System.Array constructor #107565
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure that integer parsing correctly handles non-zero fractional data #106701
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics, 8.0.10
  • Convert Thread FCalls to QCalls #107495
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix hardware exception context extraction on Rosetta #107199
    Servicing-approved, area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.10
  • [release/9.0] Fix EVP_MAC_CTX cleanup in one shot #107471
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • Fix reflection-calling `Set` method on arrays #107529
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Avoid using OpenThread for out of process SetThreadContext debugging #107511
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging][infra][android] Fix Android helix queue name #107023
    Servicing-approved, os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.10
  • Disable TensorExtensionsTwoSpanInFloatOut due to https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/issues/107254 #107555
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Convert some handle APIs from FCalls to fast FCall and slow QCall #107513
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Fix thread static cleanup paths #107438
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Remove ActiveIssue for resolved issues in Vector tests #107127
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix module being set as tenured too early #107489
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Remove `BaseDomain` use in `LoaderAllocator` and event tracing helpers #107481
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • [ILStrip] Fix passing assemblies using relative path #107536
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios
  • [wasm] Implement MINT_NEWARR in jiterpreter #107430
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] [Mono AOT] Fix error when returning zero sized struct #107198
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.10
  • [mono][infra] Decrease used CPUs for x64 fullAOT CI builds #107531
    arch-x64, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [browser][MT] fix feature detection on webworker #107452
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 10.0.0

Updated

  • [mono] Fix alloca builder creation #107464
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, 10.0.0
  • [wasi] Process LinkerArg for wasi #107194
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • Remove helper method frame from Profiler hooks #107152
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, area-VM-coreclr
  • Use merged runners for ios tests #107118
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Emscripten version reference for RTM build #106881
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] more cases when looking up unmanaged delegates #107113
    arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono, 10.0.0
  • [WASI] improve single-threaded threadpool #107395
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: refactor lsra buildHWIntrinsic #107459
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] JIT ARM64: Don't emit `mov` for zero case in jump tables for shift intrinsics #107487
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add managed Mac signing implementation #107378
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Improve error message when running `dotnet app.exe` #107484
    area-Host
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2534549 #105829
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • add support for parallel Connect #106374
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure that AdvSimd.Insert doesn't zero out the upper bits #107091
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Add simple late layout pass #107483
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Consider existence of EETypes and metadata for typeof checks #107347
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Overhaul Main Workflow Docs #107415
    documentation, 10.0.0
  • [mono] unify and vectorize implementation of decode_value metadata API #100048
    area-VM-meta-mono, runtime-mono
  • Empty slice fix #107316
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Improve PipeReader.AdvanceTo(consumed) when bytes have been examined already #107360
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • [PERF] Move performance testing logic into python scripts #101143
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add AltJit entries in DOTNETVariables list of testenvironment.proj #107475
    NO-MERGE, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixing 0 length issue with constructor #107427
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Fixing System.Array constructor #107266
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • [wasm] Enable the log profiler #107434
    arch-wasm, community-contribution, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser
  • Fix reporting illegal instruction exception #107414
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Emitting more push instructions based on the push size #106516
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Remove JitGenericHandleCache #106843
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [mono][mini] Prefer calling llvmaot compiled method instead of inlining it with JIT #107401
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • fix warnings in coreclr/jit/compiler.cpp for non-Windows targets #104805
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Fixes hang in WinUI apps published to AOT #104583
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • Implement ARM32 atomic intrinsics #97792
    arch-arm32, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 10.0.0
  • Optimize 'x & cns == cns' pattern #103868
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 10.0.0
  • [iOS] [HybridGlobalization] Throw PNSE when methods with matchLength are used #107390
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [release/9.0] JIT: don't create vector constants from relocatable constants #107500
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 128.0.6613.119, windows: 128.0.6613.120 #107504
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Introducing new event for failed http requests #106284 #106964
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution
  • [NRBF] Reject orphaned records and invalid references #103632
    binaryformatter-migration, area-System.Formats.Nrbf, 9.0.0
  • [WASI] System.Net.NameResolution #107351
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Transfer arguments between calling conventions in shuffling thunks #107282
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Rewrite GetIndexOfFirstNonAsciiByte #104503
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • [mono] Fix crash in emit_llvmonly_handler_start #107461
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] [browser] Fix processing of satellite assemblies from referenced assembly during publish #107398
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Disable UnitTest_GVM_TypeLoadException for fullAOT jobs #107502
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add JsonPascalCaseNamingPolicy #100017
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Target .NET 10 / net10.0 #106599
    area-Infrastructure
  • ARM64-SVE: Allow SVE ops to re-use the same registers #107084
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Add a SearchValues implementation for values with unique low nibbles #106900
    area-System.Memory, 10.0.0
